original_title: Long John Baldry: In the Shadow of the Blues
overview: This music documentary celebrates the long and influential career of Long John Baldry, a pioneering British musician whose blues revivalism inspired The Beatles, The Rolling Stones and a young Eric Clapton. Featuring footage of early performances and commentaries from a number of musicians for whom he was a great influence.
title: Long John Baldry: In the Shadow of the Blues
